thread.section_title: The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: AWESOME STAY!
thread.title_full: AWESOME STAY! - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: travelbud4
title: AWESOME STAY!
text: Our stay exceded our expectations. Everyone at the hotel literally bends over backwards to be nice and very attentive to all guests. The food, location, beds, were amazing! At first, I thought the room was going to be bigger that what I got.... No issue at all, EVERYTHING else made the stay awesome.
